name: VSCode-MAUI-Archive
description: VSCode extension for .NET MAUI Archiving applications

commands.title: MAUI Archive: iOS - List of provisioning profiles
MAUI Archive: iOS - List of signing identities
MAUI Archive: Android - List of Keystores & Check signature
MAUI Archive: Android - Generate code signing key
MAUI Archive: Documentation of publishing Android apps (Microsoft)
MAUI Archive: Documentation of publishing iOS apps (Microsoft)
MAUI Archive: Documentation of publishing Windows apps (Microsoft)

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.buildConfiguration.description: Determines the build configuration for the dotnet publish command

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.enableSolutionFileFo.description: Enables whether the extension should search for .sln files too (not just only .csproj).

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.androidKeystoreDirec.description: Set a custom directory where your Android keystores are located at. Leave blank for default.

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.androidKeytoolPath.description: Set a custom path to the keytool location. Leave blank for default which will use the keytool from %PATH%.

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.useExplicitAndroidVe.description: Set a custom Android version as target framework. Example-excepted: net8.0-android33 Value should be '33'. Leave blank for default.

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.iOSRuntimeIdentifier.description: Determines the default runtime identifier for iOS. Example: ios-arm64

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.useExplicitiOSVersio.description: Set a custom iOS version as target framework. Example-excepted: net8.0-ios13 Value should be '13'. Leave blank for default.

VSCode-MAUI-Archive.useExplicitWindowsVe.description: Determines the windows version for the dotnet publish command. Example-excepted: net8.0-windows10.0.19041.0 Value should be: '10.0.19041.0'
